metadata.title: CVE-2021-44482 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in YottaDB through r1.32 and V7.0-000. A lack ofinput validation in calls to do_verify in sr_unix/do_verify.c allowsattackers to attempt to jump to a NULL pointer by corrupting a functionpointer.

criterions.comment: yotta package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
